title: Verify: Selecting HBO NOW successfully opens the HBO NOW app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Roku device
AND has added the HBO NOW app to their library
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects HBO NOW from any Roku menu
custom_expected: THEN the HBO NOW app will open successfully

title: Verify: HBO NOW can be accessed while the Roku is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Roku device
AND the Roku device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND HBO NOW is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects HBO NOW from the Roku menu
custom_expected: THEN HBO NOW will open successfully

title: Verify: HBO NOW can be accessed while the Roku is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Roku device
AND the Roku device is currently connected to a wired network connection
AND HBO NOW is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects HBO NOW from the Roku menu
custom_expected: THEN the HBO NOW will open successfully

title: Verify: User receives an access gate if they have not previously logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW app is installed
AND the user has not previously accessed the app
custom_steps: WHEN the HBO NOW app is accessed
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive an access gate
AND will be unable to continue without first logging in (Subscribe/Sign In)

title: Verify: User will NOT receive an access gate if they have previously logged in with an entitled HBO NOW account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW app is installed
AND we have already logged into the HBO NOW app with an entitled/subscribed account
custom_steps: WHEN we access the HBO NOW app from the main Roku screen
custom_expected:
THEN the access gate will not be encountered
AND the user will be brought to the HBO NOW Home screen

title: Verify: HBO NOW can be exited pressing BACK from Cold Start Screen/Access Gate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the HBO NOW app has been opened without having an account logged in
AND the app is at the Cold Start Screen
custom_steps: WHEN the BACK button is pressed
custom_expected: THEN the app exits back to the Roku main menu

title: Verify: Subscribe & Sign In buttons on Cold Start Screen when not logged in and no purchase has taken place
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the HBO NOW app
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the app
custom_steps: WHEN the HBO NOW app is accessed
custom_expected:
THEN we will be presented with the cold start screen which displays two options

+ Subscribe 
+ Sign In

title: Verify: Selecting Sign In directs app to Virtual Keyboard screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that HBO NOW has been accessed without an entitled account logged in
AND the Cold Start Screen displays with options for Subscribe and Sign In
custom_steps: WHEN the Sign In option has been selected
custom_expected:
THEN the app directs to the virtual keyboard screen
AND the HBO NOW logo appears on the top left of the screen
AND Email Address text is displayed on the top right of the screen
AND Enter HBO NOW Email Address is displayed in the virtual keyboard
AND OK and CANCEL buttons appear underneath the virtual keyboard.

title: Verify: Selecting BACK at Sign In Screen returns the app to the Cold Start Screen / Access Gate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Sign In has been selected at the Cold Start Screen 
AND the app is at the Sign In screen
custom_steps: WHEN the BACK button is pressed on the Sign-In screen
custom_expected: THEN the app returns to the Cold Start Screen

title: Verify: Restore Subscription button appears on Cold Start Screen when account purchased on device is signed out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has HBO NOW installed on a Roku device
AND had previously purchased an HBO NOW account on that Roku device
AND had signed that HBO NOW account out of the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user access the app
custom_expected:
THEN the Cold Start Screen displays two buttons: 
 
- Restore Subscription
- Sign In

title: Verify: Selecting Restore Subscription directs the app to the HBO NOW Home screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an HBO NOW account that was previously purchased on the device has been signed out
AND the Cold Start screen displays a Restore Subscription button
custom_steps: WHEN the Restore Subscription button has been selected
custom_expected: THEN the app is directed to the HBO NOW Home screen.

title: Verify: Logging in with expired HBO NOW gift card account displays Renewal cold start screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not signed into the app
AND is presented with the Cold Start Screen
custom_steps: WHEN an expired HBO NOW account purchased via Gift Card has been signed into the app
custom_expected:
THEN a Cold Start Screen is presented
AND the text displays as 

"Get one month free. 

Hi, <FIRST NAME OF ACCOUNT HOLDER IN ALL CAPS>
Your gift card subscription expired. Get one
month free when you choose to renew" 

AND Two buttons are displayed: 

- Renew for $14.99 each month
- Renew Later

title: User Registration: Verify selecting SUBSCRIBE initiates the IAP flow
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW has been downloaded to Roku 
AND launched from the Roku menu

custom_steps: WHEN the user selects and activates the Subscribe button
custom_expected:
THEN the Request to share information text box appears 
which enables the user to quickly share their Roku account information as the email address to be associated with HBO NOW
if the click the SHARE Button
THEN Roku registered email is auto filled in email entry field.

title: Scenario: Login Authentication Failure and Cancel - HBO NOW Sign-in

GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW app
AND we have previously registered an HBO NOW account
AND no HBO Account is signed in on the Roku or assigned to the currently logged in Roku ID
AND we launch HBO NOW app and are presented with the access gate
AND we activate "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
custom_steps:
WHEN presented with the HBO Sign-in screen
AND we activate "Sign-in with HBO NOW"
AND we enter invalid credentials (unrecognized email)
custom_expected:
THEN a Login Error Screen (or message) will appear
AND a message regarding 'Invalid email or password' will be shown
AND all formatting and text will be readable
AND activation of CANCEL will return user to HBO Sign-in page

title: Scenario: Login Authentication Failure via wrong password and Lockout  - HBO NOW Sign-in

AND we have previously registered an HBO NOW account
AND no HBO Account is signed in on the Roku or assigned to the currently logged in Roku ID
AND we launch HBO NOW app and are presented with the access gate
AND we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
custom_steps:
WHEN presented with the HBO Sign-in screen
AND we activate "Sign-in with HBO NOW"
AND we enter valid credentials (Email)
AND if we attempt to sign in more than 5x with invalid password via RETRY
custom_expected:

AND a message regarding 'Account Locked' will be shown
AND all formatting and text will be readable
AND (more to come upon clarification)

custom_steps: WHEN we observe the Home screen

title: Verify: Content added to Watchlist via Add function populates Watchlist
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW channel has been accessed
AND programs from 3+ items have been added to the Watchlist via the Add button from the respective content's launch pages
AND the user has noted the most recently added program
custom_steps: WHEN the Watchlist is accessed
custom_expected:
THEN the most recently added program appears in the first position
AND additional program thumb hints are visible to the right 
AND all available thumbs can be selected/activated

title: Verify: Content Removed from Watchlist via Remove button in Asset Details removes program from Watchlist
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW channel has been accessed
AND items have been added to the Watchlist 
AND the user notes a specific program in the Watchlist
AND the user opens the noted program's Asset Details page
custom_steps:
WHEN Remove from Watchlist button is activated
AND the Watchlist is then accessed
custom_expected: THEN the program that was removed does not appear in the Watchlist

title: Verify: Content can be removed from Watchlist
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW channel has been accessed
AND content has been added to the Watchlist 
AND the Watchlist button is selected
custom_steps:
WHEN a program thumb in the Watchlist has been activated
AND the Remove From Watchlist button is activated on that content's launch page
custom_expected:
THEN the Remove button changes to an Add to Watchlist button
AND going back one screen to the Watchlist menu shows the program thumb appears with 30% Opacity to signify removal  
AND upon exiting Watchlist and returning, the program thumb is no longer present

title: Verify: Content can be removed from Watchlist and subsequently returned before exit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW channel has been accessed
AND content has been added to the Watchlist 
AND the Watchlist button is selected
AND a program thumb in the Watchlist has been activated
AND the Remove From Watchlist button is activated on that content's launch page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user goes back one screen to the Watchlist menu 
AND observes that the program thumb appears with 30% Opacity to signify removal 
AND activates the dimmed thumb 
AND re-adds the program to the Watchlist
custom_expected:
THEN returning to the Watchlist screen shows the program thumb appears with full Opacity 
AND upon exiting Watchlist and returning, the program thumb is still present
